question: Which country was occupied by Nazi German forces during World War II through "Operation Margarethe, 1944"?
explanation: Hungary was occupied by Nazi German forces during World War II through "Operation Margarethe, 1944". Operation Margarethe was the occupation of Hungary by Nazi German forces during World War II, as it was ordered by Hitler on 12 March 1944. A plan for the occupation of Romania was devised under the name Operation Margarethe II but was never carried out.
